channel.title: Generative Learning on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Generative Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Generative Model of Symmetry Transformations
item.description: Generative model learns data symmetries for improved efficiency and higher test log-likelihoods.

item.title: Generative Forests
item.description: Generative Forests (GFs) revolutionize tabular data generation with a novel forest-based model and a simple boosting algorithm offering strong convergence guarantees, significantly outperforming curre…

item.title: Self-Consuming Generative Models with Curated Data Provably Optimize Human Preferences
item.description: Curated synthetic data provably optimizes human preferences in iterative generative model training, maximizing expected reward while mitigating variance.
